ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Furniture Expanded: Security
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Trunken, XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla Furniture Expanded: Security stengthens your defenses with an uncomparable bulwark of new buildings and missing elements. This mod offers well balanced protection in each category and on each techlevel with uncomparable art close to RimWorld made by a dedicated and professional artist in teamwork with two experienced coders, passionated about what they do with love. Enjoy!
